name: A large metal shield named "Tal Larnin"
data: It decreases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (poor in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users electric resistance strongly.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'inner strength'.
Tal Larnin modifies the user's resistance to electricity.
Tal Larnin modifies the user's skills.
